property.name: chart.gutter
property.description:
The gutter that the chart uses. This is effectively the margin.
Default: 25

property.name: chart.color
property.description:
The color of the radar chart.
Default: rgba(255,0,0,0.5)

property.name: chart.circle
property.description:
What value to draw a circle at. Defaults to zero (off). You could use this to represent a limit of some sort.
Default: 0

property.name: chart.circle.fill
property.description:
What color to fill the circle with.
Default: Not set

property.name: chart.title
property.description:
The title, if any, of the chart.
Default: Not set

property.name: chart.title.color
property.description:
The color of the title.
Default: black

property.name: chart.title.vpos
property.description:
This allows you to completely override the vertical positioning of the title. It should be a number between 0 and 1, and is multiplied with the gutter and then used as the vertical position. It can be useful if you need to have a large gutter.
Default: null

property.name: chart.labels
property.description:
The labels to use for the chart.
Default: An empty array

property.name: chart.text.font
property.description:
The font used to render the text.
Default: Verdana

property.name: chart.text.color
property.description:
The color of the labels.
Default: black

property.name: chart.text.size
property.description:
The size of the text (in points).
Default: 10

property.name: chart.background.circles
property.description:
Whether to draw the grey background circles.
Default: true

property.name: chart.linewidth
property.description:
The width of the outline.
Default: 1

property.name: chart.key
property.description:
An array of two descriptions. The actual radar, and the indicated limit circle.
Default: Not set

property.name: chart.key.shadow
property.description:
Whether a small drop shadow is applied to the key.
Default: false

property.name: chart.key.background
property.description:
The background color of the key. If the key covers too much, you can use a semi-transparent colour - eg. rgba(255,255,255,0.7).
Default: #fff

property.name: chart.contextmenu
property.description:
An array of context menu items. More information on context menus is here.
Default: [] (An empty array)

property.name: chart.annotatable
property.description:
Whether annotations are enabled for the chart (ie you can draw on the chart interactively.
Default: false

property.name: chart.annotate.color
property.description:
If you do not allow the use of the palette, then this will be the only colour allowed for annotations.
Default: black

property.name: chart.zoom.mode
property.description:
Can be used to control whether the zoom is in thumbnail or canvas mode. Possible values are: thumbnail and canvas.
Default: canvas

property.name: chart.zoom.factor
property.description:
This is the factor that the graph will be zoomed by (bigger values means more zoom)
Default: 1.5

property.name: chart.zoom.fade.in
property.description:
Whether the zoomed canvas fades in or not. This also can be used to control the fade in for the zoom in thumbnail mode.
Default: true

property.name: chart.zoom.fade.out
property.description:
Whether the zoomed canvas fades out or not. This also can be used to control the fade in for the zoom in thumbnail mode.
Default: true

property.name: chart.zoom.hdir
property.description:
The horizontal direction of the zoom. Possible values are: left, center, right
Default: right

property.name: chart.zoom.vdir
property.description:
The vertical direction of the zoom. Possible values are: up, center, down
Default: down

property.name: chart.zoom.delay
property.description:
The delay (in milliseconds) between frames.
Default: 50

property.name: chart.zoom.frames
property.description:
The number of frames in the zoom animation.
Default: 10

property.name: chart.zoom.shadow
property.description:
Whether or not the zoomed canvas has a shadow or not.
Default: true

property.name: chart.zoom.thumbnail.width
property.description:
When the zoom is in thumbnail mode, this is the width (in pixels) of the thumbnail.
Default: 75

property.name: chart.zoom.thumbnail.height
property.description:
When the zoom is in thumbnail mode, this is the height (in pixels) of the thumbnail.
Default: 75
